EmailTemplate.description: email alert to IO owner notifying IO has been approved by Legal
EmailTemplate.name: Legal Rejects IO
EmailTemplate.subject: {!IO__c.Name} has been rejected by Legal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!IO__c.OwnerFullName},
{!ApprovalRequest.Process_Approver} has rejected your request for {!IO__c.Name}.
Comments: {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
Best,
SF Support Team
